attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As has been written about by Nick Duffell in his master peice 'The Making of Them' great damage is done to children when separated from family and the opposite sex. He states that this breaks six UN conventions on the rights of the child. 
The system is utterley sadistic and leads to deep seated mental health problems in later life. As Mr Duffell states, it is an idiotic sacrifice of the Upper Classes.
